title: Green d'hide chaps (g)

Item ID7378

Green d'hide chaps (g) are part of the green d'hide gold-trimmed armour set, along with a green d'hide body (g). Their stats are identical to green d'hide chaps, but they have a gold trim. To wear green dragonhide chaps (g), a player must have 40 Ranged.

This item is a reward from medium Treasure Trails. Unlike normal dragonhide armour, this item cannot be made via Crafting or any other skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-10+8
 Defence bonuses
+12+15+18+8+17

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 September 2021
(update)

Green d'hide chaps have received the following changes:

  • Stab Defence bonus decreased from +22 to +12.
  • Slash Defence bonus decreased from +16 to +15.
  • Crush Defence bonus decreased from +24 to +18.
  • Ranged Defence bonus decreased from +22 to +17.
18 June 2015
(update)

Fixed a stretching issue with void robes and dragonhide chaps whilst using Zul-andra teleport.

12 June 2014
(update)

The item was renamed from "D'hide chaps (g)" to "Green d'hide chaps (g)".

7 August -
30 October 2006

The item was renamed from "D-hide chaps(g)" to "D'hide chaps(g)".

22 March -
20 April 2006

The item was recoloured slightly.

15 March 2006
(update)

The item was made available to free-to-play players.
